Skill Tree Planner (WIP)

PURPOSE: Complete Weekly Deliveries item list with approximate Market Value.

The 'Market Values' will never be 100% accurate and WILL VARY BETWEEN WORLDS, use as an approximation only.

Very High & High value items should always be sold on the market.
Medium items should be sold on the market, but usually only for a little bit more than the NPC price.
Low value items can generally be safely sold to NPCs, unless the supply is really low on your server.
